wikipedia_page.main: Denys Pouncey (1906–1999) was an English cathedral organist, who served in Wells Cathedral

response: St Matthew's is also a concert venue for Northampton. The church is home to the Northampton Bach Choir who were founded by Denys Pouncey in 1935 and for many years had St Matthew's Director of Music as its Director. The church also has links with the Northampton Music and Performing Arts Trust, the Northampton Philharmonic Choir, the Northampton Chamber Choir and many other groups. St Matthew's also houses a manual organ built by J. W. Walker & Sons Ltd in 1895.  Regular organ recitals take place.

link_mentions.page: List of organists and assistant organists of Wells Cathedral
response: *1936–1971 Denys Pouncey, with Peter Lyons (musician), who was Director of Music at Wells Cathedral School, as Master of the Choristers from 1954-1960.
